title: S.T.O.P. Surviving Time outside Prison
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Prisons - Australia

abstract: Awareness-raising report on the plight of ex-prisoners
description: Awareness-raising report on the plight of ex-prisoners of Deer Park correctional facility to secure adequate support for women who have been released from prison. Produced as a news story for SKA TV's Access News, a grass-roots alternative to mainstream news and current affairs, broadcast weekly on Melbourne's Community Television station Channel 31 since 1994.
